commnet: I feel lucky I found Faisal. Outstanding professional! I am grateful for your work.

abstrac: WordPress Website Design and Developer | Wix Specialist
bio:
Hi, I am Faisal Shahrior, web design and developer specialized in WordPress and WIX. I have 5+ years of experience in web design and development. I have built over 300 websites in the tenure of my freelancing career for various shapes of businesses all over the world. I have good grip on HTML5, CSS3, BootStrap4, JavaScript, JQuery, PSD to HTML conversion with responsive website, PHP, WordPress theme customization, PSD to WordPress conversion. In addition I have skills in Graphic Design for Business Card, Flyer, Brochure and Web/mobile UI design.

I love in working with CMS like wordpress, wix, squarespace, weebly etc and i love to take challenges for making different and unique designed website for my clients. Client satisfaction is my main goal. 

Travelling and photography is my hobby.

🔶I offer the following services
--------------------------------------

- Responsive WordPress website design
- WordPress theme customization
- WordPress e-commerce website using the Woocommerce plugin
- Build modern, professional and outstanding websites using free or premium theme like Avada, Divi, Astra, betheme or any provided theme and Elementor Page Builder
- Fix WordPress issues
- High converting landing page
- WordPress speed optimization
- WordPress Security
- On-page SEO

🔶Why select me?
------------------------

- Unlimited revisions until you are 100% satisfied
- I will provide video tutorial/ documentation as per your need after finishing a website, that will help you to manage/update your site easily
- Created 300+ website using WordPress, elementor and wpbakery page builder
- I'm a full-time Freelancer & prefer to long-term working relationship


🔶Professional Experience
---------------------------------

❏ Professional Freelance web design & developer since 2017
❏ Former Graphic Designer & Web Developer at Metamorphosis Ltd.
❏ Web UI and Graphic Designer at Adobe Behance
❏ I’ve worked with companies of all shapes and sizes since last 5 years.
❏ I have worked on a range of different projects (print material to web design & development.
❏ I have a strong passion for the creativity and discipline that goes into UI, Graphic Design Front-end and back-end development.

🔷 Area of Expertise
-------------------------------

❐ Web Development

- Wordpress
- WIX
- Responsive Website
- PSD to WordPress
- Landing Page
- Bug Fixing
- Theme Customization
- Theme install and import demo
- Website server migration and backup

❐ Web Design

- HTML5 / CSS3
- Bootstrap
- Jquery
- PSD to HTML/BS

❐ Graphic Design

- Web Layout or Web UI Design
- PSD Templates
- Flyer
- Business Card
- Brochure


❐ If you have a project that needs some creative injection then that’s where I come in!
I am always accepting new clients, collaboration or anything else.
